svg.text: {"border":"8px solid transparent","borderRadius":"50%","backgroundImage":"linear-gradient(white, white), linear-gradient(45deg, #ff0000, #ff7300, #fffb00, #48ff00, #00ffd5, #002bff, #7a00ff, #ff00c8, #ff0000)","backgroundOrigin":"border-box","backgroundClip":"padding-box, border-box","animation":"rotate 3s linear infinite","boxShadow":"0 0 30px rgba(255, 0, 255, 1), 0 0 50px rgba(0, 255, 255, 0.8)"}
